author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police cleared 240 persons, including 76 women, from the road for trying to picket a Tasmac outlet on the Siruvani Road at Selvapuram. They sought closure of the outlet.

Protestors claimed that those frequenting the shop caused inconvenience to the public and that the shop was not closed despite protests that were organised by them on many occasions.
title: Residents block road
